RecentFieldChange.name: RecentFieldChange
RecentFieldChange.description: Use this virtual object to see how an opportunity has changed in the past seven days. Learn the previous value of a field, who made the change, and when the change was made.

ChangeDate.description: The date and time that the specified field was changed.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency value. Must be one of the valid alphabetic, three-letter currency ISO codes defined by the ISO 4217 standard, such as USD, GBP, or JPY.

FieldName.description: The name of the opportunity field that you want the previous value of. Possible values are:

ParentId.description: The ID of the opportunity that you want the change history for.

PreviousCurrencyValue.description: The previous value of a currency field on an opportunity.

PreviousDateOnlyValue.description: The previous value of a date field on an opportunity.

PreviousTextValue.description: The previous value of a text field on an opportunity.

ValueChangedById.description: The ID of the user who changed the specified field's value during the specified time period.
